channel.title: CVE Feed for Dogtag -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dogtag -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-14823|2024-08-05T00:26:39.111Z -- dogtag -- jss
item.description: A flaw was found in the "Leaf and Chain" OCSP policy implementation in JSS' CryptoManager versions after 4.4.6, 4.5.3, 4.6.0, where it implicitly trusted the root certificate of a certificate chain. Applications using this policy may not properly verify the chain and could be vulnerable to attacks such as Man in the Middle.
